attributes.action: BBC broadcasting Guidelines_Pictures & images of the prophet Muhammad (SAW).
attributes.additional_details: When reviewing their broadcasting guidelines, we urge the BBC to be considerate of the beliefs and sensitivities of the muslim population in the UK and abroad and to refrain from showing pictures and/or images of any sort which depict the prophet Muhammad (SAW).

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC and the BBC Trust.
